title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.

Maha loves rose milk. But the rose milk extract which is available in supermarkets is so high in food color which is not good for kids. So I created this beet milk which tastes exactly like rose milk plus it is healthy for your kids.

 

Beetroot Milk Recipe - Rose Milk Using Beetroots

 

Preparation time

10 mins

 

Cook time

15 mins

 

Total time

25 mins

 

Recipe type: Beverages

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 cup syrup

Ingredients

Beetroot - 2 large peeled and chopped

Sugar - 1 cup

Rose Extract - 1 tsp

Water - 1 cup

 

Instructions

Take beetroots and water in a blender and puree till smooth. Strain the juice.

Now take it in a saucepan, add sugar and boil for 5 to 6 mins.

Now take it off the heat and add in the rose extract.

Store in a container in the fridge.

Mix with milk and enjoy.
